amendment.description: To enhance the role of Congress in the oversight of the intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3845 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 62 - 29. Record Vote Number: 195.

Amendment SA 3845 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S10201-10208; text: CR S10201-10202) To enhance the role of Congress in the oversight of the intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3845 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 62 - 29. Record Vote Number: 195.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3845 proposed by Senator Byrd.
